svg.title: The Challenge: An illustrated story of Paul Morphy and Howard Staunton

cc:Work.dc:title: The Challenge: An illustrated story of Paul Morphy and Howard Staunton

tspan.tspan: This is a fan project made for chess fans and it's entirely free. I used
sources, which are not my work, and for those, the credits go to
their respective owners (see credits). You can share this work, but
it has to remain free for everyone!

text.tspan: Paul Morphy: Pride and Sorrow of Chess by David Lawson (fair use)
La Belle Aurore by Kimberly Geswein
Old Newspaper Types by Manfred Klein
